recipe.title: Thai Curry
ingredients: 1 cup fresh, finely chopped young coconut meat
1/2 large cucumber, peeled and cut into half-moons
instructions: To prepare the sauce, finely grate the ginger on a ginger grater or fine grater to extract the juice (you should have about 1 tablespoon). Place the ginger juice, peanuts, coconut meat, coconut water, almond butter, Braggs, garlic, turmeric, curry powder, and orange juice in a blender and blend until smooth. Add the Thai chile to taste.
Place the cauliflower, carrot, cabbage, and cucumber in a bowl. Pour the sauce over the vegetables, garnish with the basil and bean sprouts, and serve.
